title: Leave Buster Vs. Chat Restrict
body: Hmm i was wondering if getting a leave buster will affect getting a box or not. I got chat restrict and have that not eligible for rewards. If i get a leave buster is it that the same concept?

replies.body: The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system does not impact hextech restrictions currently.  Once you've recovered your standing with the IFS system, you'll be eligible for loot again regardless of leaverbuster queues.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Yeah thx it helped me a bunch, another question, the old client has been giving me bug-splats lately and ive been getting afk warning it is possible for you guys to take away that leave buster for a bug-splat??
